name: Greatest Golfer!
description:
Fun 2D Golf Game with fun Physics! Choose from 3 different clubs and hit the ball to get hole-in-ones! Play as the overly excited Karl, you can almost fully customize him, from green skin colors to random shirt logos.

Controls: 

WASD to walk
Move MOUSE to aim with your club
R to quickly restart
ESC to go to the menu

There are 10 fun and hard levels. If requested a lot we'll probably work more on this project and release a second level pack.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

Follow me on Twitter to support me @MrSpikyTweets
